query:
ALTER TABLE monthly_indirect_costs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS period VARCHAR(7),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS costCenterId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS value DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS observations TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'ativo',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS createdBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedBy INT;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3uYwUxtivMj8soi.e2c3e95bc24b --database aAFi3UvfwvVXettMY36Wvq --execute ALTER TABLE monthly_indirect_costs 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS period VARCHAR(7),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS costCenterId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS value DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS observations TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'ativo',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS createdBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedBy INT;
